website_summaries.verdict: Look and feel amazing in this stylish and supportive bathing suit.
pros: Stylish bathing suit design is flattering on most figures
Top has no uncomfortable underwire but uses adjustable straps to provide quality support
Crisscross detailing is fun and flirty
cons: No tummy control provided in the high-waisted bottoms

customer_reviews.title: Sexy in my 2piece
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a bathing suit online. I’m the “I need to try everything on at the store before I buy person.” I really love the suit. A lot of compliments. Ordered 3x. I’m 5’8 330lbs Fcup.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Buy this suit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this suit! It’s well made, supportive, and comfortable. I carry most of my weight in my stomach and boobs, and I normally stick with black bottoms, but I’m so happy I stepped out of my comfort zone. This is the first time I’ve written a review on amazon, that’s how much I love this! I just bought it in the red top and polka dot bottoms. For reference, I normally wear a 20-22 and a 2x. 5’6, 250lbs, 44F and the 3x fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: It fits and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is true to the sizing chart photo. I'm a size 22, I bought a xxxl and it fits perfectly. Also, it's comfortable. I love when other women share their photos so here's mine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McNichol

customer_reviews.title: I love this swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! I have looked far and wide for a fun color bikini that looks good on a size 20 woman, I went with a 3X and it looks amazing! I am so happy and I’m definitely getting other colors-
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I got it in the olive green color it’s very nice & flattering
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit fit very true to size, I got it in the olive green color it’s very nice & flattering. I actually wish I would’ve sized down so that it would hold in my pudge a tad better lol
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Buy IT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2x and the top fit like a glove it was perfect and I have 40DD. Very supportive. The bottoms were perfect too! Don’t hesitate to purchase this suit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another suit I would like to order top/bottom separately.
customer_reviews.text: Top was awesome! Bottoms meh. Wish I could've ordered the top by itself. I actually considered keeping the suit so that I could wear the top with some grey bottoms but, ultimately, ended up sending it back. The suit runs a little small in my opinion. Color is beautiful, quality is good. I am 5'6" 160 lbs 36C and ordered a medium. The bottoms did not really have much support and ran a little small.
customer_reviews.author: skye2sea

customer_reviews.title: It FITS
customer_reviews.text: This is the first of many swimsuits I have purchased that is truly true to size. I ordered size 2X. For reference: I am 220 lbs, bust 40DD, I wear 1X-2X tops, size 16 bottoms. Because I am top-heavy, when ordering online, I am always concerned about the fit and cup size - this top fits perfectly, offers amazing support, and is easy to adjust. Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene H.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit!!!! Would of given five stars but the top does not provide very much support. The bottoms fit great. Seems to be made well but have not used it in water yet. I did order another one in black but chose to downsize to a large and see if the top fits better. All in all great product. I am 5'8" with a 36-38 D bust and weight 193lbs. I carry a lot of my weight in my belly area as I have had 6 kids but bottoms give good coverage and look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: nwright75

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6", 210lbs, have a 46" bust and wear a 38H in bras. I bought the XL and the top was just a little too small for the girls, but still looks and feels great. My new favorite bikini and I might buy another in a different color for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: emily mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant to buy a swimsuit online since I couldn't to try it on but I followed the size chart and it actually fit perfectly! I love that it's high waisted and covered my belly and still looks cute. the material is well made and I can't wait to swim in it. For reference, I am 5'6 200lbs bust 45 in Waist 39 in hips 46 in I ordered XL (14-16)
customer_reviews.author: Mellamolady

customer_reviews.title: Top fits well!
customer_reviews.text: Wife's review: Fits pretty well, especially the top. I have difficulty finding bathing suit tops big enough, I'm 5'3", 185lb, and 38G. I fall out of most bathing suit tops, but I stay in this one, so it's a winner in my book! It's comfortable enough to wear all day at the beach and while swimming. I knocked off 1 star because the bottoms are a little too snug compared to the top. Otherwise, it's a great suit, great price, looks cute on, and didn't make me feel self conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute suit. It’s pretty thick for the price. The color is a nice olive green. It’s high waisted (5’ 2”). It’s all around good! The bottoms are roomy at the waist and tighter around the thighs. It’s full coverage in the booty. They also came with a hygiene liner. The top is fitted without constricting. 40C and I have room in the cups, but it’s not obvious. It’s surprisingly a lot of coverage even with the opening in the front. The back wide and has coverage. Straps up hook in the back to do a criss cross if you want. Zero complaint, I would order this suit again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Confidence booster
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit it. I have stereotypical mom bod. After two kids and being 34, I’ve gotten very self conscious of myself. I am getting sick of the frumpy suit I have and saw my friend who’s a little bigger than me totally rocking a two piece high waist. So I decided to try it. And I am not disappointed. I am 5’4 and 210 and wear and 18. I got the 18/20 (xxl) and am so happy. I am so comfortable and confident in this suit and it’s extremely flattering. If you are on the fence about getting it. Do it!
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am so comfortable in this swimsuit! It fit as expected, good quality and I felt secure. I typically wear a size 14-16 so I went by the size chart and ordered an XL in the olive green color. I just wore in on my recent trip to Hawaii and I couldn’t be happier! I have a larger chest area and I am typically worried of being too revealing or having “spillage” issues. This suit kept everything secure and comfortable to swim in. I loved the olive green color and now I might have to purchase in other colors. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't order plus size, however, since I am a 34DDD its very hard for me to find swimsuit that provides the support I need. This swimsuit fits GREAT. I was really happy to see that this item offered a Large. If you are pretty top heavy I would recommend this to anyone. My Sizes--Bust 44in-34ddd, Waist 32.5, Hips 41. Will post pictures after my trip in April!
customer_reviews.author: B. Pace

customer_reviews.title: horrible elastic
customer_reviews.text: WHY MAKE SUITS FOR BIG BUTTS AND USE TIGHT ELASTIC!?! I will never understand. I got this suit and its huge on me everywhere except the thighs and butt. It digs right into me! EW! I am 5'7" and 146 pounds and this is a horrible fitting swimsuit. I gave it 2 stars because I like the sewn in cups and the material is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering for curves
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bathing suit! Very flattering if you have curves or a tummy. It provide some some lower tummy control without giving you a muffin top. I love the criss cross of The straps in the front of the top. I highly recommend. update: Like many of the other women noted, the bottom strap on the back is a little too tight and unless you have 0 fat in your back it will create a little roll.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: ... first high waisted two piece swimsuit and I absolutely love it! Love the criss cross detailing on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first high waisted two piece swimsuit and I absolutely love it! Love the criss cross detailing on the front and the sides. The top and bottom make me feel secure and supported. I wore it for the first time to the beach on the 4th of July and felt very comfortable while in the water. I feel that it fits true to size and would recommend purchasing it. Material doesn’t feel cheap and is an overall great bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Great High Waisted Bathing Suit!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this suit for a Cancun vacation. To this day, it is one of my favorites that I always receive compliments on. The quality is great, not flimsy thin but not too thick where it’s uncomfortable. It hugs your body in the right places, and accentuates your figure. After many uses, it still looks the same as when i first bought it! I love this bathing suit, and the olive green is a beautiful color. Runs true to size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how this suit fits and looks. The bottoms went up high enough to cover stretch marks and the top holds me in but yet makes me feel pretty too. There are plastic pieces sewn into the side seams on the top and one of those has come out already but it doesn’t seem to affect the way the top fits. For that reason the quality may be a little less than expected. I have only worn it about 7 times. I had been looking at this same suit on another site for triple the amount I paid here so I’m not even mad about it.
customer_reviews.author: codyusf

customer_reviews.title: Great-fitting, cute suit
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this suit. I am a size 14. 5’4”, 190 lbs, 36DDD. I ordered the XL. It for perfectly and ran true to size for me. I was super happy that the top provides great coverage and support for my ample chest which is always an issue in buying a bathing suit. My two teenage daughters proclaimed this super cute- stylish but still plenty of coverage. I am really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and sexy without feeling overly exposed
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated swimsuits in the past. I found them incredibly unflattering and uncomfortable making me even more self conscious. But this suit fits like a dream. I felt like my girls were contained and supported, my bum was covered and my tummy minimized. The first time I wore this my friend liked it so much on me she whipped out her phone right there at the pool and bought one for herself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D

customer_reviews.title: but I’m so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy swimwear from Amazon, but I’m so glad I did. This was one of two suits I bought for vacations. The day I wore it, I got compliments all day. Wears well, washes well. I followed the size chart and my fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: nrh880

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! I have A long torso so often the high waisted suits hit me in a weird place and don’t look right but this is perfect! The bottoms aren’t the *best* material ever, but for the price they’re still good and fit well. Love the top! This is a very flattering suit for busty ladies. Size 14/16pants, 38F/G bra
customer_reviews.author: Brin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was really stressed out about sizing for this. But then I saw the pix of all of the lovely ladies who shared hight, weight, and size purchased and with that I was able to pick the exact size for me. The pieces are comfortable, no pinching, fits as it should, and great quality (no missing stitches or loose threads).
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: i got the 2x I really like it but if the top wasnt as flowy as it is you could see my underboob. I love everything else about it I'm a 44 DD. and I have a 44 inch waist for any comparison. I wear a 20 to a 22 in jeans. but its very flattering to the body and hides and rolls u might think you have. for the price I love the suit.
customer_reviews.author: DoYuEvenCarry

customer_reviews.title: Only suit I will buy from now on!!!
customer_reviews.text: This suit it absolutely wonderful and the price is even better! I ordered a 3x and am a 22/24. I am smaller in the chest and larger in the hips and thighs. the 3X works so well. I could use a 4X in bottoms just to be a true high waisted bottom, but its not necessary. I will be ordering more next summer for sure!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Cute and flattering!!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER worn a two piece swimsuit in my life. I’m a size 20-22 in bottoms and 22-24/3x in tops. I have a large chest (44G) so I ordered a 4x based on the size chart so the top would fit. I knew the bottoms would be big but they are not as big as I thought and are wearable. This is a super cute swimsuit and so flattering! I bought it because literally everyone looked amazing in it in the reviews. Can’t wait to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: MaryKate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but no breast support
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bikini and I absolutely love it!! I do not have a bikini body but my husband encouraged me to purchase it and I’m glad I listened. It’s very comfortable and size fits as expected. My only suggestion is if you’re looking for breast support this may not be the bikini top for you as it does not have any support. I have large breasts and it’s flattering but underwire would be a nice touch. I am hoping the red color will remain vibrant after a summer of swimming but so far it has remained the same after about 10 swims in chlorine and rinsing in tap water afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this suit so much that I have it in black and red! I love the sexy peekaboo laces on the top and the sides of the bottoms. The bottoms have mesh on the sides so it's not too revealing. Both pieces fit well. I did have issues with two suits having defects but it was quickly resolved both times. These suits are also comfortable enough to do some serious swimming in. It is cute and functional, so I can snorkel or boogie board without having to change in to a more athletic suit. I carry my weight mainly in my stomach and this suit covers my lower belly, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Aselixcrane

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this swimsuit. It is true to size and very comfortable. It is hard to find. Swimsuits that fit good especially without being able to try on. Just for measurments I am 5; 2 254lbs and wear 42ddd typically. This is a perfect suit for a bigger girl. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: High quality, adjustable straps. I love this suit!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this suit! It seems well made & fits as expected. I love that the crossover straps are adjustable. I’m 5’4” & wear a size 14. I bought the XL & it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Ester

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I feel so good in this. The bottoms go really high, about an inch above my belly button, the top is so flowy and flattering. The whole suit is made out of quality material. I even fee like I could wear a high waisted pant with this top and wear it out. At my weight bathing suits normally make me feel like a sideshow attraction but this suit makes me feel like Becky with the good butt. I’m so happy. For reference I’m 5’3 240lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bathing suit! It has great colors and really looks good on a plus size girl! The waist does come up pretty high, so there is no belly button seen. I would have liked it to he a little lower. But over all great purchase. I am a size 20/22 bought 2XL
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality suit!  Just a little too big.  Don't size up,  size down if anything.
customer_reviews.text: Don't size up! If anything size down one or two. I am 212lbs I purchased a 3xl. Should have went with a 1xl. I was swimming in it. Literally (lolol 😅) Top was semi- comfortable but still big. The product itself was great quality, though. Just a little too big! Will return for right size
customer_reviews.author: David & Holly Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Fit fit fit
customer_reviews.text: I must say first when I saw made in China I said ok I lost my money it not fitting bc everytime i choose 3x or 4x it's like they devise it so u get a miniature version of what u ordered. But when I open that bad and saw correct size I almost fainted not only did it fit as I wanted and hoped but feels good on the skin and material nice I will be walking the beach in my sexy pink 2 piece wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Etta spicer

customer_reviews.title: I love this swim suit!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2x I’m 5’2 189lbs and 38j up top. I love the top. I feel totally comfortable and secure. The Back of the top is adjustable it had 3 notches to make the back strap tighter and you can tie the tighter to secure your girls in. Now the bottoms are a little big. I’m not heavy on the bottom half but I wish we could by the pieces separately.
customer_reviews.author: Mykeva

customer_reviews.title: True to size and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7 198lbs and I bought XL. It fits perfect not too tight or loose. I thought it was going to be tight and it was going to create those little small handles but it didn't! It goes over my belly button. I read other people's reviews to pick my size. I usually wear L XL shirts , 13-15 junior jeans. I'm usually a 38c bra size. Hope this helps somebody! :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My wife got alot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was definitely a plus. It looks very nice, fits nice and my wife recieved alot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: arturo boyce

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit just a bit snug for me!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this swimsuit after such positive reviews! The olive green was a beautiful color and the swimsuit provided good coverage for a high waisted bikini but I felt like the waistband was really snug. I’m typically between a size 10 and 12. I ordered the 12 and it was way too tight around the ribs and waist. The top had adjustable straps and provided good support but I felt like it ran small and I couldn’t move in the size I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Big win for curvy girls!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm curvy and have a hard time finding the right suits to fit both my top and bottom comfortably. I ordered my usual XL and this fits perfect. The top fits great for those that have larger chests (F cup here). The bottoms fit a little loose but its comfortable and doesn't look horrible (I take 14-16)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fit too small
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute. The bottoms come up pretty high, which is nice, but it covers in the back like a granny panty. No cheek, no moons. And I got alot to cover back there. Needless to say I was caight between impressed and a little sad. The straps are adjustable and you can cross them in the back.... if you have enough strap to do so. I ordered the size I thought I would need based on their sizing chart. It fit. But barely. It's a little too tight for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Cable

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍😍 I'm in LOVE 💜
customer_reviews.text: Oh em geezers. This little 2 piece fits me PERFECT. I have always been unsuccessful when getting bathing suits due to my shape (small waist/big arms and breast) but this one right here... Got sis looking and feeling AMAZING... Its holds and supports EVERYTHING.. For reference I am 5'4 and 176 lbs. I will be buying more.. Yaaaaay
customer_reviews.author: CandyCurlz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I receive the wrong size and the return was easy. I had my new swimsuit in 2 days! I am a size 16-18 and bought the 2xl now that I have been wearing it for 2 weeks it’s a little bagger then I like. Should have went xl. But will definitely buy another suit!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia🌺

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a XL and so that is what i ordered. The top is perfect!!!!! The bottoms are HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is awesome and fit just as expected (I referenced the size chart provided). I bought it with a few other swimsuits on Amazon and both the bottoms and the top are interchangeable with so many other suits too! Has upheld quality for 2 summers (I live in MN) now.
customer_reviews.author: cristalynn84

customer_reviews.title: For Plus size ladies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit!!! I got the 4x I am VERY PLUS SIZE. Depending on material of clothes wear 2x tops (22), 3x-4x (24 or 26-28) bottoms. I am a heavy bottom (hips and back side). I got the pink. Top is a little loose but adjustable so its good! My sister is 46 DDD and it fit her nice as well. Bottoms fit perfect! I'm getting more!!! Found some remnant light fabric cheap and mom is adjusting it to fit my bottom for my sarong. I had to review this!
customer_reviews.author: CheeChee

customer_reviews.title: Love the cut of the top!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this swimsuit just for the top! I wanted a black top I could wear with colored bottoms. It fit perfectly! It's hard to find bikinis that the tops are not tiny and give a little more support. The bottoms are cute but not really my style so I have only gotten use on the top piece.
customer_reviews.author: Baleigh Powell

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the olive green bathing suit and I LOVE IT. The material is so thick and incredibly comfortable. The only negative is that the bottoms didn’t go up as high as I would have liked but I was still comfortable enough to wear it. This is a steal for the quality of this swim suit.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan

customer_reviews.title: well made NOT cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made swimsuit, the color is rich and beautiful, I love the adjustable shoulder straps for extra support. I bought one size down thinking it would provide better support and I wish I hadnt. the swimsuit is supportive on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Great material and hold; classy and sexy in one.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried ordering my first swim-suit online. However, the reviews were on point. The material in this is well constructed and gives a firm hold in all covered areas. For someone with a similar shape as the model, this suit felt classy and sexy while being modest in coverage. Truly worth every penny spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This suit is for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this fit as it should compared to all the other suits I ordered. It’s super flattering and well made. Not thin material and most inportanly the top holds everything in. This suit is for everyone, I am not plus size and bought s medium but I am not s tiny bikini girl Becauae rhey never fit right. This one did.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli L Belfatto

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this swimsuit! From the moment I put it on I felt sexier. The army green color is amazing for light skin tones. The swimsuit is sufficient in covering back fat which is a big selling point for me. I was sceptical with this purchase due to how inexpensive it was but I have no regrets and am super happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 18 with a 40DD bra size and always worried about enough support for my chest and mom belly area and this swimsuit is fantastic! All the support I need in all the right areas and it’s super comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Canlas

customer_reviews.title: Well made and just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit! I’m pleased with the fit the look the quality, no complaints . Do I look like the model in it .... no of course not! No magic in the suit , just you in a cute suit!
customer_reviews.author: terra

customer_reviews.title: Super cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really flattering suit. I’m 5’3 and 205lbs, and this covered everything nicely. The top does float up in the water which was a little annoying, but still highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Plus size approved!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bikini. I was looking for something a little out of my comfort zone because I’m usually a tankini kind of girl. This shows just the right amount of skin for me to still feel comfortable. I usually wear a 3x at Torrid, but I wanted to make sure the material wasn’t super tight so I got a 4x. It worked out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ELITE Computer Services

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back!
customer_reviews.text: It was cute but the too was way smaller then the bottom! It was to tight and I'm not a big girl at all. 5'3 145lbs 34b cup sadly has to return! It was just to uncomfortablly tight!
customer_reviews.author: Crystallina

customer_reviews.title: Really cute (bought a size 2x)
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 14/16 bottoms and I’m a 40B bra, I bought the 2x and the bottoms fit great they cover most of my stomach, the top however was a bit snug (I have very broad shoulders maybe that’s why) but overall good quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You'll love the fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bathing suit!! I got an XL based off of reviews, I'm 5ft 215 and had a baby so I have the lower belly pouch and 38 dd bra size. The XL fit like a glove. Sucked in my tummy and I was nervous about the cup size looking too small but it actually kept the girls in place and felt secure and sexy. I'm going to get the green one too!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never worn a two piece because of my tummy and would never take a pic wearing a bathing suit but for the sake of empowering other women here you go. I love how this holds your tummy, feels super comfortable, and allows a women to embrace her curves and feel sexy. Buy it, you won’t regret. I got an xl in green
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Tummy control
customer_reviews.text: Love this suite. I wear anything from a 14-16 to a 16-18 and went with the xl. Fits perfectly. The bottoms have great tummy control and the top holds the girls up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Sexy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim suit! I’m 5ft 1” and 160lbs. I got the pink in L. This swimsuit covered my csection scar and tummy fat well, while still looking sexy. My husband LOVED it ;). The colors match as shown. I feel comfortable and sexy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: DubbKitty

customer_reviews.title: Cool styles. Small bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Got the XL army green version of this suit and love the top. The bottoms are sized weird for me though. I gave a small waste and thic hips/thighs and the bottoms ... wish I could order 2xl bottoms and xl top but oh well. The armygreen top goes good with my polka dot bottoms from my other order where the top didnt fit. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitting suit I’ve ever purchased. I’m an average build woman size 8/10 but I have a large bust. I never thought of ordering plus size but I’m glad I did. The top gives perfect coverage and the bottoms are super cute too. The material is very good quality. I bought red and for the price I think I’ll order another color.
customer_reviews.author: steven willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: I don’t confer myself to be bottom or top heavy... I’m fairly evenly proportionate. However, the top was huge and the bottoms were very tight. Not flattering at al!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley White

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathing suit but runs small
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is super cute. However it runs a little small. I normally wear an XL - 2X. I ordered a 2X just to be safe, but it wasn’t safe because it was too snug. Ordered a 3X which fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, bright colors!! I ordered the XL the model and I are pretty much the same size and body type. I followed what other said and what size she was wearing. It is super cute and I am so excited to wear it to the beach. No regrets it's a fantastic suit.
customer_reviews.author: Erynn B.

customer_reviews.title: True to size and truly cute!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit fits so well! It was super cute and flattering. I love how it is truly a high waisted bikini. The only complaint I would have is that the small was a little smaller than expected, but it still fit just fine and was great vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gray

customer_reviews.title: Best two piece
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how great this fits! I wish I had ordered another one. I read the reviews and ordered according to my size and measurements and it fits great it hides my tummy but exposes the perfect amount of skin without being frightening.
customer_reviews.author: Keya Gomez

customer_reviews.title: This swimsuit makes you feel awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received lots of compliments on the suit and the color. Can’t believe I feel comfortable in a two piece again. I’m big chested and the support on the sides broke already, otherwise this would be a five star review.
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, modest, high-quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and fits well. I don't remember if I have ever had a swimsuit that fit so well and was reasonably modest without being hideous and unflattering. This is so cute. Definitely a good purchase. I was surprised at the great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Snug
customer_reviews.text: I really think it's cute, it's just kinda snug though. I'm gonna order a size up to see if that helps and send the one I dont want back. I'd recommend ordering a size up right now
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn Carson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: very supportive top and bottom for a big girl. not too revealing either. its nice and neat even if you have a fupa. i ordered a 2x. i wear a 1x normally.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Unflattering
customer_reviews.text: This suit is cute but unfortunately not flattering. It fits bigger than expected, I ordered size 3X and the bottoms are extremely baggy. The top fits well but it offers no support for my boobs. If the top had underwire it would be a 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brossard

customer_reviews.title: Happy with fit and look
customer_reviews.text: Normally wore 14 or 16, 5'1", 40c bust, and 194lbs. I purchased xl, which fit great. I was worried would apply too much pressure in the bust area due to chronic skin problems but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: moya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Order this suit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Well made. The suit is completely lined. Washes well. Beautiful colors. True to size. I ordered 3X. You will love this suit
customer_reviews.author: ronald fleming

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim suit! Needed something sexy with coverage for Mexico due to having a c section 4 months prior. Held my 38DD in well and kept my baby pouch contained.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Sydney Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathing suit for my trip to Costa Rica. Wore it three times and the bra part of it broke. Super cute but I wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McBird

customer_reviews.title: Really cute suit
customer_reviews.text: I’m about 275 pounds 5’10” and this suit is SO CUTE. I have a hard time getting myself into cute bikinis that show a little tummy (I have a tall torso so it shows more than the average person but that’s okay because I feel so confident in it! I ordered a 2X I’m a DDD and it fits a little snug but fine at the same time, I order my suits a little small cause most suits stretch but the material seems really sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is perfect! I like boob support and this one has it! No underwire but doesn’t need it!! Love love it! And I love the high waist being I have stretch marks from having kids!! Great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Yaya kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 20 and ordered the 2XL suit. It fits great and seems to be pretty great quality. Love my new suit!
customer_reviews.author: Ave

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: 5’11 220 wear a 1X 40 DD brought a 2X fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mlovely

customer_reviews.title: Nice swimsuit, served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and received complements. Top was perfect, bottom was too big. I’m a 18/20 and bust size is 40H if that helps anyone. I could have gone with the 2x. I’ll by another for my next cruise but hopefully 2 sizes smaller 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bathing suit and always get compliments when wearing it!!!! Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT RIGHT NOW
customer_reviews.text: This suit is a game changer! I spent so much time in stores looking for options but they were all either too tight or too old feeling. I wanted something fun that still showed skin! This doesn’t pinch or rub ANYWHERE. The fabric is super soft, too! Good support up top without feeling suffocated. For reference I am 5’3 and around 215 size 40DD.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ramseyer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little big but is a nice option for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: The color was nice. It fit a bit loose, and I'm afraid if I had ordered a size down it would have been too tight. I wish it had more tummy control, but that may have been due to the fact that it fit very loose on me. Overall, its a good looking swimsuit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great material and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love the suit and the green color of it. The bottoms didn't go up on my waist as high as I wanted but it fits good and the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: CKnt

customer_reviews.title: Small and Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this run small, but the bottoms are nowhere near as high-waisted as they appear. If you have a short torso and are small, maybe this will work for you... but as a plus-size long-torsoed lady this was really disappointing! There are some other bathing suits on Amazon with underwire that fit much better than this at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s good fit
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at this suit! The fit is great, construction is nice and is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Suesue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bathing Suit
customer_reviews.text: This suit folks. This suit. I absolutely love the color and the fit, I ordered a red 2x and normally wear a 16/18 and it’s a perfect fit. The two pieces almost meet which is exactly what I hoped for. It is well-made for the price! Can’t wait to wear it
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not for chesty women
customer_reviews.text: This suit is not for chesty women. I sized up & not so sure ANY of the tops would have fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Clapson512

customer_reviews.title: I love it but it didn’t hold my boobs well
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bikini that would hold my boobs well and I saw good reviews on this one but it didn’t do it as well as I thouhht
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to suggestion on site. Absolutely perfect fit, figure flattering & comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ogle Temple

customer_reviews.title: Top is tight for bigger breast
customer_reviews.text: It's best to order a size up if you're more well endowed in the breast area. The bottoms fit perfectly but the top was very snug and I was spilling out.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Im still on the fence about this one
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms fit great, the top was a lil meh... I don't have really big boobs for a plus girl so I thought that it would fit me fine ... at least from the reviews I saw the all had big ones and it looked great.. maybe i need them for this suit??lol .. anyway ill give it another try and see how i like it :)
customer_reviews.author: Chenoa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bikini!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever wore bikini and I felt so confident in it! It’s a nice material and is very flattering
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Top is great
customer_reviews.text: The top is perfect for a size 40DD-38DDD but the bottoms are too high and too big for my size med to large bottom
customer_reviews.author: amanda bassoff

customer_reviews.title: You need this bathing suit!!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is cute and totally flattering. I feel super confident in this and the tropical print is really fun! Definitely, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Starr

product_meta.title: Yomoko Women's Plus Size High Waist Bandage Bikini Sets Chic Swimsuit Retro Bathing Suit
feature_bullets: Material:82% nylon + 18% spandex, two piece of bathing suit with Good Elasticity, very soft and comfortable for your skin. It will make you look amazing during beach vacation, pool swimming, beachwear, yoga, sports, Honeymoon and Hawaii, etc

Top: Adjustable shoulder straps, a clasp hook closure on the back, soft padded and wireless bra with flexible boning provides maximum support; Front cross cutout bandage make this swimsuit more fashionable, charming and striking.

Bottom: High waisted bottom features in full lined, low-cut legs; Ruched pattern in the bottom perfectly accentuates your curves, hiding the imperfection yet still flattering; Seeing through mesh & bandage amp up bathing suits more sexy, awesome and chic
This plus size bikini swimwear can show your fit figure, you will become more active and confident in this swimsuit.

ATTENTION PLEASE: Please use our recommended size table in the left picture. Please Adjustable the shoulder straps before you try it. Wash Instruction: Hand wash cold. Do not bleach.Dry flat.Do not iron.
